      • findSubstitute

        public static boolean findSubstitute(char type,
                                     Term term1,
                                     Term term2,
                                     java.util.HashMap<Term,Term> map1,
                                     java.util.HashMap<Term,Term> map2)
        To recursively find a substitution that can unify two Terms without changing them
        Parameters:
        type - The type of Variable to be substituted
        term1 - The first Term to be unified
        term2 - The second Term to be unified
        map1 - The substitution for term1 formed so far
        map2 - The substitution for term2 formed so far
        Returns:
        Whether there is a substitution that unifies the two Terms
